column4: hey anyone who knows about proftpd i have an ftp that when i login i can go through a directory just fine and put to the same place, but when i attempt to 'get' a file it tells me the operation is not permitted, yet the permissions on the file that i am 'get'ing is -rwxrwxrwx
check your config and make sure that its not messed up any only allowing uploads
make your own just type /join #dubby or what ever you want to name it
